name: Doge Moon Launch
description:
Hold tight and enjoy your journey to the moon with doge and his rocket!
With this game, you can make your own prediction of the value, that dogecoin will reach.
..Wow

How to play:
Doge makes his own rules. You can fly on the chart to right and also to the left!
- Touch the right side of the screen to go right with the doge and his rocket.
- Touch the left side of the screen to go left with the doge and his rocket.
Rocket also needs fuel from dogecoins. You must try to find and collect dogecoins to hit the best value.
..Such knowledge

Highs can help you. But beware lows and whales!
..Advice

Features:
- cute custom graphic
- suited and funny audio effects
- customize section with new dimensions
- and .. and surprises that bring you a laugh!
..Such cool

The game is dedicated to the dogecoin crypto community and every doge, crypto fan.
..Very crypto

Have fun, be nice, and HODL!
..Many thanks
